bibl.title: The Chester Beatty Codex Ac. 1499. A Graeco-Latin Lexicon on the Pauline Epistles and a Greek Grammar.
bibl.note: Abu Manu (near Dishna), IVth century A.D.
bibl.seg: Wouters Alfons P., The Chester Beatty Codex Ac. 1499. A Graeco-Latin Lexicon on the Pauline Epistles and a Greek Grammar. (Chester Beatty Monographs. 12.)
Leuven - Paris, Peeters, 1988, 8Â°, xvi-193 pp., 25 pll.
Abu Manu (near Dishna), IVth century A.D.

C.R. par J. Neville Birdsall, CR N.S., 40 (1990) pp. 152-153. - Alain Blanchard, REG 103 (1990) pp. 304-306. - Willy Clarysse, RHE 84 (1989) pp. 714-717. - Anna Passoni Dell'Acqua, Aegyptus 69 (1989) pp. 277-280. - P.
